title: Four cheese veggie chicken pasta bake
ingredients: ['500g fusilli pasta', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '3 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets - cubed', '5 small green peppers, chopped', '3 small red peppers, chopped', '3 small yellow peppers chopped', '3 teaspoons soy sauce', '250ml white wine', '3 teaspoons lemon juice', '4 eggs', '2 (500ml) tubs creme fraiche', '1 pinch paprika', '1 pinch dried oregano', '1 pinch ground coriander', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', 'salt and pepper to taste', '350g Cheddar cheese, grated', '300g Emmentaler cheese, finely grated', '100g blue cheese, crumbled (optional)', '200g Parmesan cheese, grated', '500ml milk']
